short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promote digital well-being by limiting distractions on YouTube Shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusGuardian is a Chrome extension designed to help users manage their time effectively by limiting distractions from YouTube Shorts. With real-time tracking, motivational warnings, and automatic tab closure, FocusGuardian encourages users to build healthier online habits and stay productive.

Key Features:

Real-Time Countdown
Track how much time is left before the YouTube Shorts tab closes. Stay informed and in control of your browsing habits.

Motivational Warnings
Receive two warnings before your time limit is reached, complete with engaging visuals like a stop GIF and motivational messages to remind you to refocus.

Automatic Tab Closure
Once your set time limit is exceeded, FocusGuardian automatically closes the YouTube Shorts tab to prevent further distractions.

Customizable Settings
Set your own time limits, view the remaining time in real-time, and track previously set limits with the extension's user-friendly popup interface.

Popup Dashboard
Access live updates about your time usage directly in the popup, allowing you to monitor your screen time effectively.

Why FocusGuardian?
Whether youâ€™re a student, professional, or anyone looking to improve productivity and manage screen time, FocusGuardian is a lightweight, easy-to-use tool that helps you stay on track. Build better habits and reclaim your time with Focus Guardian.

Disclaimer:
This extension is designed for educational purposes to help users manage their time effectively. Any YouTube content shown in demonstrations is solely for illustrative purposes.
